mEWrEVYpE8FHBobJc.name: Oxygen Storage
mEWrEVYpE8FHBobJc.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

m03Gpr_i6K6gg4lat.name: Oxygen Storage
m03Gpr_i6K6gg4lat.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mEvL8gv6NDzf1-o2Y.name: Oxygen Storage
mEvL8gv6NDzf1-o2Y.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mL7d0vI78JKR4ziDp.name: Oxygen Storage
mL7d0vI78JKR4ziDp.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mwM7al540hvFxEmLL.name: Oxygen Storage
mwM7al540hvFxEmLL.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

tX7nPrNkBS-Aqy8hy.name: Flight
tX7nPrNkBS-Aqy8hy.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

malBC2FG_cGG71ysQ.name: Diffuse
malBC2FG_cGG71ysQ.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

m4WO7WiwSEnteQfuE.name: Homogenous
m4WO7WiwSEnteQfuE.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mj85-An2sHwWNuZvj.name: No Blood
mj85-An2sHwWNuZvj.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

msC_5KxqM-bVOKiaq.name: No Brain
msC_5KxqM-bVOKiaq.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mK8BCXFrWphEuBre9.name: No Eyes
mK8BCXFrWphEuBre9.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mWLxzbpg97heRyfpq.name: No Head
mWLxzbpg97heRyfpq.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mnYwCU7ZphaCeJLwr.name: No Neck
mnYwCU7ZphaCeJLwr.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mRNli9Vibo54t3zHV.name: No Vitals
mRNli9Vibo54t3zHV.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mwNbGJBmiLea0umN1.name: Unliving
mwNbGJBmiLea0umN1.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
